dmca.title: Shareup.com Requests Takedown of Similar Site
dmca.body:
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is our whole website: www.shareup.net (HTML files, CSS file, deign[sic] and structure) and the picture http://www.iprogramdev.com/images/download.gif

2.	The websites which are infringing our copyrighted work are: www.servletsource.com and www.worldlib.org. All pages of these two sites are copied from our www.shareup.net website. Google indexed these two websites:
	Query: allinurl: www.servletsource.com site:www.servletsource.com
	Query: allinurl: www.worldlib.org site:www.worldlib.org

Please visit http://www.servletsource.com/sitemap.htm and view its source file. You will find comment[sic] like:

<!-- Mirrored from www.shareup.net/sitemap.htm by HTTrack Website Copier/3.x [XR&CO'2003], Sat, 13 Dec 2003 07:46:08 GMT -->

Screenshot of its source file: http://www.shareup.net/dmca/sitemap-mirror.png
Simply to say, he copied our website and replaced our website name "Shareup" with word "software" in all HTML pages. For more evidences please visit http://www.shareup.net/dmca/

3.	Our contact info:

[Private]
NanKai, TianJin, 300193, China
E-Mail: [Private]
E-Mail: [Private]

4. It seems that the thief is another Chinese person who live in FuZhou, China. (I feel disgrace for this). After I trying to contact his ISP (and then his  ISP  contacted him), he updated the whois data of his two websites with the following fake information:
	Administrative Contact:

	[Private]
	Cincinnati,	0H 45243
	US
	Ph: [Private] 	FAX:

5. 	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed


7. Signature (in Chinese): [Signature] 	
 (in English): [Signature]

For more evidences please visit http://www.shareup.net/dmca
